author: Special Correspondent
text:
Selection of students under sports quota for admission to engineering, arts and science courses offered by the Kalasalingam University here will be held from April 6 to 8. According to a press release from K. Sridharan, Chancellor, students will be selected in the disciplines of track and field, basketball, badminton, chess, volleyball, hockey, football, kabaddi, kho-kho, swimming, table tennis and handball. Those who have represented the zone, district or region in sports events and the State in national competitions can take part in the selection. Those who have completed Plus Two or a degree course in arts and science subjects are eligible. The university will also offer scholarships for outstanding sportspersons.

More details can be had by dialling 9788225996.
title: Selection of students under sports quota
